alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 24 at 1:01PM EST until December 25 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 18. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20 possible. * WHERE...Coffee, Jeff Davis, Bacon, Appling and Atkinson Counties. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until 10 AM EST Sunday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis
